website_summaries.verdict: Big pocket area and design of the glove makes it easy to snap closed, which is great for youth.
pros: Glove's design will help kids learn how to catch the ball the right way by encouraging catching the ball in the pocket
This glove ships having been broken in already, which is perfect for those kids just learning the game
Available in both left- and right-handed designs
cons: Thick finger area provides padding, but makes it tough to gain a feel for the ball

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this glove
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure about purchasing without seeing in person and trying it on but decided to try it out and turned out to be perfect. Small enough to be able to handle it easily but still has enough room to last the next 2 seasons. The glove pocket and middle 3 fingers are very soft. The thumb and pinky finger pockets seemed a little stiff but didn't seem to have any trouble closing it right out of box and I'm sure with use they will loosen up some as well. Great mit for ages 6-8.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old son loves baseball and has been playing for 4 years now. Started with tee ball and now his last year on coaches pitch before moving up next year. We have bought quit a few gloves the last couple of years but this has been his favorite of them all. Soft and broke in already feel to it. Great price for a very nice glove.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The quality is wonderful, very soft and flexible
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son on his 8th birthday, he is a very average size. It is smaller than I would have wanted, the tag says it is for ages 7-8 which would have been helpful in the description. The 9.5" is the entire length of the glove from the longest point. The quality is wonderful, very soft and flexible. I would recommend for ages 5-7. Hoping I can squeeze 2 years out of it, but likely only 1.
customer_reviews.author: AaBlaze

customer_reviews.title: 2nd one I have bought
customer_reviews.text: Its a great glove for young 4-7 years of age boys or girls. Soft enough for them to squeeze it closed and nice to hold to thier abuse. I have two sons my first wore his first glove out so got a secnd to finish out his tee ball and then upgraded him to an expensive glove now and handed this one down to my 4 year old who is catching pop flys and throws with it yesterday. Great Glove for the price
customer_reviews.author: Billy E.

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 6 year old near end of season. It is slightly too big for him (he seems to be sane size as other 6 year olds). He will grow into it. Black leather is nice and not too stiff. Used some glove conditioner on it too. Look forward to tossing with him again!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: VERY SMALL !!
customer_reviews.text: No need for sugar coating... buy it a store where you can have your son try it on. Bought the glove for my 8 year old and its very little, it doesnt fit at all, it does fit my 6 year old very very tighly so at least heel use it cause his size is for 4 year olds i guess. DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME OR MONEY ! go into the store and try it on first....
customer_reviews.author: Simple ReviewsTop Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: This glove was very soft and easy for my 6 year old to close
customer_reviews.text: This glove was very soft and easy for my 6 year old to close. It was hard to find a quality left hand throw glove in the stores around me & I was unsure about buying it without seeing it. The first glove I received was a right hand throw, but Batter's Choice was quick to fix the mistake and sent a new glove out quickly and sent me a return label for the other one. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Max & Tanner's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great mitt for a new player
customer_reviews.text: This mitt is fabulous. My son is 7 and a new baseball player. He’s tall - ( 4’ 2” ) and has bigger hands. This mitt is perfect for him. It was pre conditioned so we didnt have to work it in much more before the start of the season. Very happy that we purchased this one.
customer_reviews.author: Zachy11

customer_reviews.title: Perfect glove for young baseball players
customer_reviews.text: Perfect glove for young kids to truly learn how to catch a baseball! My son is six and this glove fit perfectly. It's super easy to close so he can concentrate on the fundamentals and not worry about the ball popping out.
customer_reviews.author: miguel

customer_reviews.title: The Glove is Black not brown like the picture!!
customer_reviews.text: The color is off!! This is a BLACK glove not brown!! The picture is brown so I assumed that’s what I was getting! No mention of the color in the description! I love the glove otherwise! Great for my 8 year old!
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: My 7 yo is starting to play baseball, he is tiny for a 7 yo so needed something soft enough to use. Still working on it.....
customer_reviews.author: austin

customer_reviews.title: MICHAEL JACKSON DIDN'T WEAR THIS GLOVE
customer_reviews.text: GOOD FOR GRAND SON MOSTLY WHEN WORN ON HAND, NOT HEAD
customer_reviews.author: dbx

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad glove for the money
customer_reviews.text: My son doesn't like change and didn't want to replace the glove he'd outgrown 2 years before, but once he finally gave this glove a chance he never went back.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: A proper baseball glove
customer_reviews.text: I bought this purely off the reviews I read about it. And my boy loves the glove. Appears to be good quality (for the money). There are way less instances of him catching the ball in his glove and then the ball falling out. I would have gave it 5 stars. But the wrist strap doesn't stay tight. Infact it doesn't stay looped through the D rings at all.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: Good for immediate use
customer_reviews.text: This is a great glove for a youth. Needs a little break in period but it’s still very functional for immediate use. Comfortable fit and should be a good glove for several years before the youth becomes full grown. Great pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry A.

customer_reviews.title: Good glove
customer_reviews.text: This is a good glove, easy to close. It has taken some getting used to but my son is doing much better at catching now. My only complaint is it is still a little hard for him to close. He is 6 almost 7 average size. The sizing is hard to determine online
customer_reviews.author: April Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love the prospect series for tee ball, coaches pitch and young kids pitch players. Soft all leather gloves are perfect all around gloves.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Nice and smooth RECOMMENDED
customer_reviews.text: I really like the leather used to build this glove, looks really nice and the price is good for a great quality product. RECOMMENDED
customer_reviews.author: Diego_CamiloRT

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Totally bummed that two black mits with metal adjusters showed up to my house and I don't have time to return before my boys' games. Sku on them matches the brown ones I ordered but they're def not the glove pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany  Fields

customer_reviews.title: it's soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My son had baseball practice and he loved the mit and for curiosity we compared it to a other baseball mit his cousin used and he preferred this mit.
customer_reviews.author: Rawma5

customer_reviews.title: Nice all leather ball glove
customer_reviews.text: Nice all leather ball glove. A little stiff on arrival but most gloves are. A little mink oil and some use it will be perfect. Fits my 7 yr old well with enough room for several seasons.
customer_reviews.author: Roland G.

customer_reviews.title: Good glove for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good little glove. A little big for my 5 year old boy but he seems to like it and is able to close the glove.
customer_reviews.author: Spence

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great glove for a child around six turning seven years old.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Glove
customer_reviews.text: Great glove that already has the broken in feel. My son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Good first glove
customer_reviews.text: Got my sons through the baseball season. They were both fairly soft (broken in), though one was noticeably softer. My boys were 6 & 9.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Lap

customer_reviews.title: Colors dont match gloves smaller than say!
customer_reviews.text: Glove is tiny we ordered for the brown color as well when we recieved them they were jet black completely different than the pictures. If your going to advertise make sure it the same product!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great for young kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 7 year old son. It was already fairly easy to open and close for little hands, but after breaking it in for a few days, it was great! He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: JamieD

customer_reviews.title: Glove broke after 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: The glove arrived on time. Thought we had a good product. Fit well, good softness. Glove broke after 2 weeks, with normal use. I had to order another glove.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great starter glove
customer_reviews.text: Nice not for my 6 year old. Notch in glove makes it easier for my son to close the glove when the ball hits the pocket. Very good starter glove.
customer_reviews.author: Reed C.

customer_reviews.title: It’s a baseball
customer_reviews.text: Really great glove! Quality! Already ready to use! Perfect! And great price!
customer_reviews.author: CURTIS ANTHONY FRANZ

customer_reviews.title: no
customer_reviews.text: stiffest glove ever, i dk what the other reviews were referring to ? maybe i received a different mitt?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For 6-7 years old
customer_reviews.text: This glove is perfect for 6-7 years old kid. It would help if it says it in the description. Other than that ot is actually a great globe, and ita soft.
customer_reviews.author: L. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great glove
customer_reviews.text: Needed a glove quick for my 8 year old. Got and was pleasantly pleased with the condition. Already soft and worked in. My son loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary DeGaetano

customer_reviews.title: Great glove. Saw the improvement in my 6 yr ...
customer_reviews.text: Great glove. Saw the improvement in my 6 yr old immediately. The glove allowed my son to catch the ball more freely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great glove
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful glove. Great company. Will last him all through youth baseball.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Winston

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent glove for my 8 year old son. Came already broken and game ready.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Fuchs

customer_reviews.title: Great glove for the money
customer_reviews.text: good glove for my 8 year son. very soft no need to break the glove.
customer_reviews.author: jin k.

customer_reviews.title: Great Glove, Easy To Catch
customer_reviews.text: Great glove! Bought for my 7 year old and immediately saw improvement on his catching. Easy to close, no real need to"break-in" the glove. Half the teams parents bought one for their kids after seeing results of improvement from my kid.
customer_reviews.author: Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Great for older t-ballers
customer_reviews.text: Butter soft and perfect for my 6 year olds little hand. It's easy to close and nice looking!
customer_reviews.author: Chester

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best Youth Gloves out there. Quick break in and great quality
customer_reviews.author: Matt D.

customer_reviews.title: Great glove
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5 year old lefty. He loves it. It's a little big but will probably fit him perfect by next year.
customer_reviews.author: J Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great glove for my 7-year-old, now 8-year-old...
customer_reviews.text: My 8-year-old loves this glove. He's used it for rec and all-stars games since he was 7 and it fit perfect then and now. Fantastic glove that felt like it came broke in already. Was well worth the price and has held up through many, many games.
customer_reviews.author: Brian S Swiger

customer_reviews.title: Ready to use out of the box !
customer_reviews.text: Great glove - easy to close and open - with the cut out in the wrist area it didn't even need broken in ...
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 6 year old son
customer_reviews.text: Really well made glove. Perfect for my 6 year old son.
customer_reviews.author: Marcie A. Spradling

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: My son's coach recommended this specific glove and we have not been disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ash_Mello

product_meta.title: Mizuno GPP1075Y1 Youth Prospect Ball Glove
product_meta.description: Patented PowerClose makes catching easy. Power lock closure for maximum fit and performance. Helps youth players learn to catch the right way, in the pocket.
feature_bullets: Item Package Dimensions: 14.6 L X 23.5 W X 24.3 H (Cm)
